review: The Fire Stick arrived in a timely manner and was easy to install and program. I am disappointed with the avialable viewing material. There is little that is not available from Netflix. I am also disappointed with the trial Prime subscription and will not continue after the trial period expires. Particularly dissapointing is the viewing cost of much of the material even on Prime.
